headline: Is NetApp’s (NTAP) New Board Voice a Subtle Pivot in Its Customer-Led Cloud Strategy?
summary: Earlier in January 2026, NetApp added Paul Fipps, President of Global Customer Operations at ServiceNow, to its ten-member, predominantly independent board, bringing deep experience in technology-enabled growth and customer transformation. This appointment adds fresh customer-operations expertise to a board where half the directors have been appointed within the last five years, potentially influencing how NetApp aligns sales, partnerships, and digital experiences with its storage and cloud...
